data.eml:eml: A new species of the fishfly genus Neochauliodes van der Weele (Megaloptera Corydalidae) from India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Xingyue, Hayashi, Fumio (2019): A new species of the fishfly genus Neochauliodes van der Weele (Megaloptera Corydalidae) from India. Zootaxa 4652 (1): 183-188, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4652.1.12
